body:
By the way, currently `parameterized_docker_build.sh` uses `sed` to replace the following in Dockerfile in order to provide different builds:

```
# --- DO NOT EDIT OR DELETE BETWEEN THE LINES --- #
....
# --- ~ DO NOT EDIT OR DELETE BETWEEN THE LINES --- #
```

I don't know enough about the history of the code base. However, I do think the above could be achieved through other means like `--build-arg`, which might be easier to maintain. Wondering if it make sense to make some changes in this part?
